nodes.bodyText: We were referencing two Features: our enum and the allure class.  After refactoring, we don't need to refer to the enum.
We need to reference both our enum and the allure Feature annotation. One of them has to have a fully qualified class name.

extract test to constant.
shouldn't this be an IllegalArgumentException instead of a MuleRuntimeException?
